lead_paragraph: Pocono Raceway is not for sale. Rose Mattioli said Tuesday that her family has no plans to sell the Nascar track, which has two Sprint Cup races. “It never was available; it never will be available,” said Mattioli, who owns the track with her husband, Joseph. Speedway Motorsports Inc. purchased Kentucky Speedway last week, and there was speculation the company’s owner, Bruton Smith, had his eye on Pocono. If he bought that track, he could have moved one or both of its race dates to any of his speedways.
